name: Alex Martinez
notes: Sent detailed proposal for enterprise package, awaiting feedback

name: Jennifer Lee
notes: Budget approved, ready for proposal stage

Negotiation session with procurement team. Discussed payment terms and SLA requirements.

name: Amanda Davis

Sent welcome email with case study from referral client and scheduling link for intro call.
